petNameAdd:
1) STATE OF ASSAM
    Advocate - Tapan Kumar Bhattacharya

business_details.Business: Accused Joynal Abedin Paramanik has been produced from jail hajot. Seen the accused.Accused is heard on the point of sentence u/s 235 (2) Cr.P.C. The accused has submitted that he is a poor man. He prays for exoneration. Considered all aspects.Accordingly, the accused is convicted and sentenced rigorous imprisonment for 10 (ten) years and to pay fine Rs. 3000/- in default of fine another period R.I for 1 (one) month u/s 6 of POCSO Act. Set off the previous hazotee period, if any.District Legal Services Authority, Dhubri is informed to pay compensation to the victim as per norms.Let a free copy of Judgment and order be given to the accused.The case is disposed of.
